website_summaries.verdict: A basic beverage tub that gets the job done without chipping or leaking.
pros: Simple design that can be used for formal or casual events
cons: Smaller than the other beverage tubs on this list

customer_reviews.title: I love the thickness of the plastic
customer_reviews.text: I love the thickness of the plastic. Very nice! I would've given it 5 stars but the original one was cracked. Thanks to Amazon my replacement was here THE NEXT DAY!!! It's so sophisticated looking!! Simple but unique design. Ok I just finished cleaning from my party and I emptied the ice and water from the bucket. No condensation. No sweating. No run off. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job !!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I needed. I used it for a gift while adding 6 bottles of wine for a bridal shower gift, it's very sturdy and ended up looking amazing!! It was priced very well compared to many other beverage buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small party, but it sweats
customer_reviews.text: The tub was the perfect size for a small baby shower I hosted. It held two big bottles of wine, two quart-size bottles of juice, a dozen cans of water and lots of ice. It looked nice on the counter, but after an hour it started to leave a puddle. Some of the reviews said it didn't sweat, but that's not accurate. Next time, I'll just put a towel under it because I plan to use it often.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly held 4 champagne and prosecco bottles for the mimosa bar.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than it appears
customer_reviews.text: This was much smaller than I expected. In the picture it fits 4 wine bottles but in reality only fits 2. But it is well made and looks nice. I used it to hold champagne for a mimosa bar. Worked well for that.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, classy way to serve drinks at parties. I purchased 2 for a birthday party with about 15 guests. I put water bottles in one and cans of soda in the other. I placed a small towel underneath each, just in case, and was happy to see that there was very little condensation. It was easy to see when I needed to refill, and easy for guests to see the selection of drinks. Very easy cleanup. Will be using these for future parties I host.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great tubs for party!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tubs for a party. They were great! They looked good, worked well and did not sweat. I put wine with ice in one and just ice in the other and they looked great on the table.
customer_reviews.author: CJL

customer_reviews.title: Good for beverage display
customer_reviews.text: After reading a million different reviews on different party tubs I finally decided on these. To clarify, these come in one piece and does not have another tub inside which you can separate as another reviewer indicated. They are made with thick material and are pretty when filled with ice and beverages. With ice, these can fit 3-4 magnum bottles of wine comfortably or about 10-12 cans of soda.
customer_reviews.author: Yan G.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product. I purchased this one to replace my larger drink bucket. The plastic is nice and clear, heavy duty and fits about 3-4 large bottles of bubbly or 6 bottles of white wine comfortably with ice. The only down fall is the condensation on the outside but a towel under the bucket works just fine. would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Tub is strong and pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.text: I filled the party tub with ice and cans of soda pop expecting that it would sweat and drip on the counter. I put a towel under it in preparation only to find that it did not drip or sweat over the several hours of use. The tub is very strong and is nice to look at. After six hours there remained half of the original ice and of course some ice water from the melted ice (still no dampness on the towel). I am very pleased and impressed and recommend this as an attractive way to serve cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and looks like glass
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and looks like glass! During events or when we have company, I set this on my island with the wine bottles on ice. It looks so nice and the handles on the side are also great. I looked at a lot of other party tubs and this one was the nicest. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Josie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful and high quality
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and high quality. I use them a lot when I entertain for chilled champagne ect. Only down fall is that they sweat, so you do need to put a towel underneath, and they are not insulated so ice melts quickly where I live, even inside. It’s also hard to drain and refresh the ice if the bucket is full of beverages because there is no plug or drain but, I assume that would not be estheticaly pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: The second two were perfect. We’re using these for creamers for my daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these. The first two came with one of them having a huge busted up crack on the side. The second two were perfect. We’re using these for creamers for my daughters wedding at the coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a Holiday party with multiple white wines to chill
customer_reviews.author: ladybabs

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product was scratched when we took it out of the box. The box it came in was in good condition. I think they need to wrap it in bubble wrap or something because I read a few of the other reviews from buyers who had the same issue. I returned it, which was too bad because it looked nice. I found a cheaper, durable one at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and practical; holds 5-6 wine bottles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bridal shower because I needed something that could hold several bottles of Prosecco for our mimosa bar. This can hold 5-6 bottles of wine easily, and even more if you’re using it for smaller bottles/cans. The clear plastic means it goes with any decor. It’s not too big, which I like; I can still lift and move it even when full.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Using it for a different purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this. I’m going to use this for my baby’s first birthday photo shoot. After his cake smash I will put him in this tub for a bath. It is nice and sturdy so I’m not worried about it tipping over. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: I am responsible for parties at the law firm that I work at. We have always struggled with sitting beverages out for a party. Many of our gatherings are more upscale. These worked fantastic. They are insulated, and kept the beverages cold for several hours. They do not leave any sort of residue or transfer moisture onto the table. I received many favorable comments and inquires about them.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Good large capacity holder for drinks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use at a party. They hold a lot of cans and wine bottles. I got at least 24 cans in one and the other was large enough to hold 6-8 wine bottles. They are made of a sturdy thick acrylic but have no insulation so they do sweat when filled with ice, but I expected that. Great for party use.
customer_reviews.author: LDMullins

customer_reviews.title: Very chic beverage holder!
customer_reviews.text: This party beverage holder looks good on the party bar. It doesn’t hold a lot of beverages, I got 3 canned drinks, 6 beers bottles and 3 water bottles plus the ice, but I didn’t have a large party, so it was good. I also needed to place a towel underneath so the condensation didn’t wet the bar, not big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Camlyn305

customer_reviews.title: Simple but elegant
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. Looks good, but inexpensive. I would definitely order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: classy looking way to keep drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: Used two of them on New Years Eve to keep champagne and wine cold. Very nice and will go with any decor. We have an outdoor pool and plan to use these for outdoor parties as well, since they are plastic. I can see using them for freezies for the kids, keeping salsa and dip cold outside, beer, pop, wine. They did not sweat at all, like another reviewer had said. It's a very solid thick plastic that held up well. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Scholtz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to 3 bottles comfortably, or 4 bottles only if you use it with shaved ice. I use these for weekly wine tastings and love it for its portable size and built in handles. I’ve been using weekly (sometimes 3 times a week) for over 4 months without any cracks or scratches.
customer_reviews.author: JAsh

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR COMMERCIAL USE! Breaks very easy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few of these thinking they will be very durable. They maybe for non commercial use but if you are planning on using them at a bar or for VIP Bottle Service, you may want to look for other options. These break very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great party tub!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's baby shower as I was serving a lot of champagne. I had two champagne bottles and one bottle of white wine chilling on the wet bar. It worked perfectly and looked elegant too. I am so happy that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brownieyumyum

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Large Container
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a punch container. We needed a very large and durable punch bowl because we were putting in ratios of a fruit ice mixture to several bottles of Sprite for a slush punch. Most punch bowls were not big enough. So this worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven McKinzie

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective Upon Opening
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective / at bottom upon opening. Returning same. Can no longer use for big party I am having on June 22
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for many uses
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought and used this for my daughters 6 month milk bath photos and now we can use it for drinks later on. It’s not glass, so I don’t have to worry about it being as breakable as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for one of these to put some wine bottles in for a brunch I hosted and it was perfect. This was great for the price as I wouldn't want to pay any more even for a glass one. Would def. buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Price

customer_reviews.title: Great for price. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used them for my baby shower to hold beer and water in ice and they were the perfect size. Only thing is the perspiration was running all over the table. Had to place on towels to keep from making a mess. People liked them and asked where I got them because they wanted to have them for parties and cookouts. Would buy again. They are thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mesi Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great for chilling and very attractive. I bought it to use at a champagne brunch and received several compliments. It looks like it is made of glass which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: evanstc

customer_reviews.title: Used for pics and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a mini bath tub for photos of my son and I’m obsessed. It feels pretty heavy duty! I love it and love that it can be used for different things!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Sagraves

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! We used for my sons 6 month milk bath photos.
customer_reviews.author: Candice White

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, doesn’t leak!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a party we were having where I wanted to keep drinks out on the counter. I filled this with ice & assorted beverages and 6 hours later there was no leakage whatsoever. It’s also very attractive and looks expensive even thought it’s a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Steel City Adventure Cats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tub several times for charity auctions, filled with acrylic ice, wine, wine glasses, chocolates and a CD by Joshua Bell. A little ribbon and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie LeBard

customer_reviews.title: Chill drinks or display treats
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I wanted to have an all plexiglass/ acrylic set for my treat tables so I purchased this initially to chill some Italian sodas, but I’ve gotten creative and have used it to put treats in as well. I love it, great addition to have
customer_reviews.author: Monet Warren

customer_reviews.title: Damaged tubs
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 tubs were damaged and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great looking container that doesn't sweat.
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner. Was looking at metal containers that were much more expensive but found this one. Ordered 2 which was helpful to hold wine in one and beer in another one. Like that it's clear so you can see what bottles are inside. Might get another one for water/soda.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Washington DC

customer_reviews.title: Such a Beautiful Option
customer_reviews.text: I used this large bucket for champagne at my wedding. The bucket is crystal clear so it worked perfectly for the ice cubes I made with petals in them. I got so many compliments it was the talk of my party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern design
customer_reviews.text: I used this for our wedding last month. Looked great on the bar to chill wine and champagne in it. Loved the design of these.
customer_reviews.author: Diva D

customer_reviews.title: Great wine chiller!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my wine display at my birthday party! Fit 3 bottles of wine + ice. Easily could have fit a couple more bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dispaly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! I bought this to chill white wine for a party...great size for four bottles...attractive and looks great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Kane

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for 200+ event, as well as at home parties. Held up well, sturdy. Can hold 4 bottles of wine, only if the slender size/regular shape wine bottles. Couldn't hold 4 bottles of Preseco because of the round shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties!
customer_reviews.text: We used this tub over the weekend for the first time and love it. It's large enough to hold several bottles of wine, an assortment of beers, juice boxes and sodas. (We used two 7-lb. bags of ice.) In addition, it cleans up without streaking or water spotting.
customer_reviews.author: Just Nan

customer_reviews.title: Stackable!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this so I bought a second cause they're stackable for storage so I can fit 2 under my counter!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: I have a part time job doing wine tastings and this tub is perfect for keeping multiple bottles of white or sparkling wine chilled. Doesn't sweat very much either. Great size
customer_reviews.author: JDogg

customer_reviews.title: This container was awesome at the wedding shower
customer_reviews.text: This container was awesome at the wedding shower! It looks like glass ! I put wine and water bottles in with ice and it was great! Lots of compliments. I also see where you could use it for a baby shower with blue punch and yellow ducks to float around!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beverage tub.
customer_reviews.text: This is great to keep beverages cold and it does not leak. I’m buying another one for large parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep wine cold for a brunch I was hosting in my home. It held 3 wine bottles easily with a lot of ice. It is sturdy. I've only used once, but I recommend it for anyone looking for something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Plus size beauty

customer_reviews.title: Love this Beverage Tub
customer_reviews.text: I used for ice at a party. It looked very nice. Very well made. It does scratch easy, so use care with metal tongs or placing items in it that may scratch it. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited for this tub for my sons milk bath photos but was disappointed upon opening it. The side is damaged. Items like this should be handled with more care.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but I love the look and weight of this thing!! Will update review after the party I purchased this item for!
customer_reviews.author: K.Turner

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear thick plastic - should be durable, useful, and is quite attractive. As a party tub it ought to work fine. (I got it to experiment using as an ice mold, since it is very close to the dimensions of my high efficiency ice chest. Beware using for this purpose, since there are wavy ridges along the sides which aren't visible in the pictures and which might cause rupturing of the tub or inability to remove ice block. Lining it should solve this potential problem along with freezing in layered stages.)
customer_reviews.author: Sudarshan

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is not hard/stable!?
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed and washed for first use with a gentle dish soap and plastic began to soften, there are permanent spots in my tub now From where the soap touched and not appealing to the eye! These are going back!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift basket!
customer_reviews.text: Used to make gift baskets and they worked out great. Easy to see what I had included but also useful and pretty when cellophane wrapped. Held many bottles of wine snacks and chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Keene_CA_lady

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needs a drip pad
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be on a surface that can get wet as it does drip condensation from the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for any occassion
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and elegant. Doesn't look cheap. Would recommend for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: NC woodworker

customer_reviews.title: ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: this clear ice/beverage bucket is very nice but it was too small for our use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Sweating
customer_reviews.text: I used it during a birthday party and it held the ice so well. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinelady

customer_reviews.title: Beverage tub
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A little too small, but it still looks great for my events
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Can confortable fit 2-3 bottles of champagne. It does sweat and cause condensation, but it is nice thick plastic. Overall good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a party and it worked great at keeping the chardonnay perfectly chilled! Goes with any party theme and looks fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Dorene Hanson

customer_reviews.title: See the wine
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and showed off the colorful flower ice cubes and various drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was thicker than I expected. Very chic to go along with my brunch theme. I had 3 champagne bottles in it but it could easily hold 6. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: I love it!, looks great on the serving table, allows the guest to see their options without to much digging around. It keeps beverage cold for about six hours without refilling ice and hold just enough drinks for a party of about twenty. I've used it a few times now and it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy container for drinks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tub in order to ice down drinks for various groups from our neighborhood that meet in homes. Most of the groups are small, 8 - 16 people, or more, This tub is perfect for water or soft drinks in bottles or cans. The capacity is a good size to accommodate ice and all the drinks. It is of sturdy construction, but the acrylic makes it light and easy to handle. I enjoy using this tub!
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: It will sweat with ice and it also can scratch pretty easily. Same with showing any water spotting
customer_reviews.text: I use it for displaying soft drinks on ice for company meetings. It works well though is a bit small. It will sweat with ice and it also can scratch pretty easily. Same with showing any water spotting, though that's average with Acrylic. Good price and works as intended
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: Nice size Container!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a product demonstration at work. It was to simulate a bathtub and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Mlmpep

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy looking wine cooler. I can fit three bottles with i e in it. Good value and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Illias

customer_reviews.title: Super Chilly & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as it is shown. I am a caterer with service staff & bartenders. We use this for an ice bucket at the bar, or to chill wine or beer. You can fit 25lbs of ice in it, as well as 4 - 5 bottles of wine. Great value! I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie House

customer_reviews.title: Very large and square shape not well suited for wine.
customer_reviews.text: Very large plastic bucket. Good for really big parties. Not good for small gatherings. Also the square shape makes it more difficult to put wine bottles inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine71

customer_reviews.title: Great containers for your party beverages
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Looks good. Holds 5 bottle of wine and is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jule36

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and looks nice. I will use it whenever I entertain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and style. Adds a polished looked for any party.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Party perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! Nice and thick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: product is as advertised, more interested in giving a star rating than any detailed review.
customer_reviews.author: ANONYMOUS

customer_reviews.title: Great item for meetings!
customer_reviews.text: Love this party tube, however it is not sweat proof! I use it mainly for bottled water for meetings. It depends on the temperature in room as to whether or not the party tub sweats. Some rooms I use it in I have no problem with the party tub sweating. In other rooms, it will sweat. So I would recommend placing a cloth under the party tub to absorb the sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Rose

customer_reviews.title: Packing
customer_reviews.text: I love this party tub, I think it will suit my needs for the holiday events that I am hosting. When I unpacked the box there were five little months in the tub, all alive, I had to catch them before they all flew over my house. You may ask the packers to check this prior to shipping future orders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drinks
customer_reviews.text: I used these for beer and wine at my daughter's wedding. They were perfect and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: G Moss

customer_reviews.title: Bottle tub
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottles tub! Nice with led light in!
customer_reviews.author: regina64

customer_reviews.title: Bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to use for a Bridal Shower. I could see it being a fun base for a gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 3 bottles of wine
customer_reviews.text: Could easily beer or soft drinks chilled too. It's nice to be able to easily see the level of the ice around the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great chiller
customer_reviews.text: This product lived up to the 5 star reviews. I used this on Christmas to keep wine bottles chilled with ice. It kept the wine cold and ice stayed as ice and did not melt a lot. There was also very little to none condensation. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to chill 3-4 champagne bottles. Worked brilliantly and looked really lovely. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Livengood

customer_reviews.title: Solid, great for events
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 needed for a resident event. We used for beverages, beer and seltzer. Worked fantastic. Incredibly sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ashbury

customer_reviews.title: Planter pot
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a planter pot for my new office plants 🌱 I love the indented handles and the depth.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Grah

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in tact. Seems to be sturdy and heavy material, not flimsy. Can't wait to put it use.
customer_reviews.author: Iyana Gray Reese

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive for ice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tub. Bought for ice. Perfect for that. Doesn’t look like it would fit 4 bottles of wine with the wine fulling submurged in ice, but since I don’t plan to use it for that, I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kanipe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice smaller than I expected but it is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Love This Party Bowl/Bucket
customer_reviews.text: A friend has had one of these for years. They take it everywhere and it has held up great! It looks so nice when filled with ice and refreshments that it looks like glass. Luckily it is a hard, nicely molded plastic in a very pretty design. When our friend found it on Amazon, we immediately ordered one. It looks beautiful and arrived safely.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice bucket. Easily fits 4 bottles on ice, looks pretty, is sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice looking ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a baby shower Mimosa Bar. It worked great and chilled 4 bottles of champagne and Prosecco. It is very sturdy and looks nice to pair with glass serving pieces and bar ware. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for our party Holds 8-10 bottles of wine comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Howard

customer_reviews.title: For Promo-modeling Job
customer_reviews.text: I needed an ice bucket that would look classy and be the perfect size for wine promos. This comfortably fits 4 wine bottles without taking too much room on my 4' table. The plastic is thick and does not look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: PurplePansy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the white wine at my party!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and worked perfectly for my white wine at my party. It's a nice size and design. You could use for a lot of different beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Laguna Lady

customer_reviews.title: The bucket is very nice but it was NOTpackaged right and it was broken ...
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is very nice but it was NOTpackaged right and it was broken so it could not be used. Ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Arias

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tub for drinks for a party....It came perfectly packaged and looks great in the bar area.I had it filled with assorted beer and wine coolers! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Great for an outdoor party
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for an outdoor party. It easily held four bottles of wine and champagne in ice. Even though it's plastic it was attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Cookn

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A great way to keep your beer on view and iced down for your next party. Light and durable.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Lace

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This large, durable tub is excellent for holding water/ice if you are looking for something elegant but practical. I personally don't use mine for drinks, but as an aesthetic water tray for a pot holding baby Venus Flytraps. Whatever you use it for, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

product_meta.title: Prodyne Big Square Party Beverage Tub, Clear
product_meta.description: Style Name:Big SquareThis big square tub is ready to party as it holds lots of ice and keeps lots of your favorite beer, soft drinks, wines, bottled water, etc. Chilled for hours. Made from durable styrene with stylish ribbed walls and easy-to-carry handles, This tub is shatter-proof and break resistant. Measures: 14" L x 14" W x 8" H.
feature_bullets: Great for beer, soft drinks, and bottled water
Made from durable Styrene with stylish ribbed walls and easy-to-carry handles
Tub is shatter-proof and break resistant
Measures: 14" L x 14" W x 8" H
